ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: ER&M Thesis writing and skills needed to put it together. We worked together!

This was the senior essay, so everyone gets very different things out of it based on what they're writing their theses on and how they're doing so. Overall, though, I'm sure most of the other seniors would say they learned how to organize their time to tackle such a lengthy piece4565 pages for the year-long thesisas well as how to think about arguments and evidence and how to better pull them together.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: It heped us stay accountable, support each other and get to ask questions to Prof. Tran

Quality of your experience completely depends on your advisor. In most cases, especially amongst ER&M majors, you will be supported and guided in the process. My advisor, Prof. Tran for instance, was nothing but exceptional in her attention and dedication towards not only me but also the work I produced. Can be an intense process, but with the right people, it can be incredibly fulfilling.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes! I'm sure there are advantages to each of the senior colloquium (this class) or writing your thesis in an upper-level ER&M coursethe first means that you get to choose what you write about much more granularly, whereas the second is overall a shorter piecebut I found myself challenged in very new and important ways by having to write more than I ever had before through the colloquium.

I would only recommend you complete a yearlong senior thesis if you have the time, if you have an advisor you want to work with, if you the emotional capacity to manager lots of stress, and if you'd find fulfillment in creating a larger academic project.

extras.title: ER&M 492 01 - The Senior Essay or Project
